title: My pixel mic and speaker doesn't work
content:
My google pixel mic and speaker had stopped working since the security update on March 2019. Every application that uses either the mic or the speakers doesn't work. When I receive or make a call my phone crashes and I have to restart it. When I start recording a video, this message appears on the screen: "can't record audio. Another app is using the mic". I can't send audio messages with apps such as WhatsApp and I can't watch videos with apps like Instagram or Telegram.
After the security update on April 2019, the speakers started working but after a few days they stopped again.
I have performed factory reset twice, still no change.
I would appreciate your help. I had to go back to my Nexus 4 to be able to at least make phone calls.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel
